channel.title: webscraping on Ezra Citrons Website
channel.description: Recent content in webscraping on Ezra Citrons Website

item.title: Will the real scrapy please stand up
item.description: Scraping lyrics title Title puns aside, I’ll be using the rvest package to scrape all Eminem song lyrics from here We will also need to clean up these columns using regex Now that we have our function to get the lyrics extract_lyrics_from_link and parse_lyrics to clean it up, we can simply loop over the number of songs on the website, and save all the lyrics. Ahh, the satisfaction of running a loop…
